医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
SOPHiA GENETICS 和 UroCCR 开发的 AI 模型可预测肾癌研究的术后结果SOPHiA GENETICS 是一家云原生软件公司，也是数据驱动医学领域的领导者，它与法国肾癌研究网络合作开展了一项研究，使用多模式算法来帮助预测肾细胞癌患者的术后结果，结果最近发表在 npj Precision Oncology 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/AI-model-development-by-SOPHiA-GENETICS-and-UroCCR-predicts-post-operative-outcomes-in-kidney-cancer-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/AI-model-development-by-SOPHiA-GENETICS-and-UroCCR-predicts-post-operative-outcomes-in-kidney-cancer-study.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=77bd4199-b554-4845-b7ad-b12ba0b122f4 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:43:00 -0400 AI model developed by SOPHiA GENETICS and UroCCR predicts post-operative outcomes in kidney cancer study
DNA 折纸疫苗 DoriVac 为个性化癌症免疫治疗铺平道路治疗性癌症疫苗是一种正在开发中的免疫疗法，它不仅可以破坏患者体内的癌细胞，还可以防止癌症复发和扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/DNA-origami-vaccine-DoriVac-paves-way-for-personalized-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/DNA-origami-vaccine-DoriVac-paves-way-for-personalized-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9bd0dc5c-2f52-49d8-9059-2ca964ad76bc Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:35:00 -0400 DNA origami vaccine DoriVac paves way for personalized cancer immunotherapy
研究强调全球神经系统疾病的负担日益增加在全球范围内，由于全球人口的增长和老龄化以及接触机会的增加，过去 30 年中患有或死于中风、阿尔茨海默病和其他痴呆症以及脑膜炎等神经系统疾病的人数大幅增加环境、代谢和生活方式风险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-highlights-having-burden-of-neurological-disorders-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Study-highlights-forming-burden-of-neurological-disorders-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c6c644d-367f-47a6-a924-8c490e65455c Fri, 15 Mar 2024 10:03:00 -0400 Study highlights growing burden of neurological disorders worldwide
需要创新方法来克服卫生系统在疟疾疫苗接种方面的障碍目前的文献调查了疟疾疫苗接种在接触高危儿童方面面临的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Innovative-approaches-needed-to-overcome-health-system-barriers-in-malaria-vaccination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Innovative-approaches-needed-to-overcome-health-system-barriers-in-malaria-vaccination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9358b9a2-7a84-4962-99a7-9c6826ec21f9 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:44:00 -0400 Innovative approaches needed to overcome health system barriers in malaria vaccination
地中海饮食对成人癌症患者健康结果的功效《自然》杂志上发表的一项新研究探讨了这种饮食对成人癌症患者的安全性和益处，以及其在该人群中的可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/The-efficacy-of-the-Mediterranean-diet-on-health-outcomes-in-adults-with-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/The-efficacy-of-the-Mediterranean-diet-on-health-outcomes-in-adults-with-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=439011f6-b19c-4550-988c-934529cef6b5 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:35:00 -0400 The efficacy of the Mediterranean diet on health outcomes in adults with cancer
探索橄榄油化合物橄榄苦苷和羟基酪醇作为神经母细胞瘤的潜在治疗方法橄榄油中橄榄苦苷 (OLE) 和羟基酪醇 (HT) 的治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Exploring-olive-oil-compounds-oleuropein-and-Hydroxytyrosol-as-pottial-treatments-for-neuroblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Exploring-olive-oil-compounds-oleuropein-and-Hydroxytyrosol-as-pottial-treatments-for-neuroblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44935949-3812-4d9f-af0a-8fd017f3fa0c Fri, 15 Mar 2024 08:15:00 -0400 Exploring olive oil compounds oleuropein and hydroxytyrosol as potential treatments for neuroblastoma
创新的 CAR T 细胞疗法靶向两种蛋白质以对抗侵袭性脑肿瘤生长脑癌治疗的突破：双靶点 CAR T 细胞疗法在早期临床试验中显示出希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Innovative-CAR-T-cell-therapy-targets-two- Proteins-to-combat-aggressive-brain-tumor-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Innovative-CAR-T-cell-therapy-targets-two- Proteins-to-combat-aggressive-brain-tumor-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c3a3044-bcdf-42e3-8274-ce45c8dd0be6 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 06:59:00 -0400 Innovative CAR T cell therapy targets two proteins to combat aggressive brain tumor growth
青少年怀孕可能与成年早期过早死亡的风险有关12 岁以上过早死亡的风险与少女怀孕和胎龄有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Teen-pregnancy-may-be-linked-with-risk-of-premature-mortality-in-early-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240315/Teen-pregnancy-may-be-linked-with-risk-of-premature-mortality-in-early-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9411b62e-e56a-4b6e-ad55-8d3a63fed518 Fri, 15 Mar 2024 06:27:00 -0400 Teen pregnancy may be associated with risk of premature mortality in early adulthood
研究表明，夫妻共同的饮食习惯会影响孕期体重增加研究表明，孕妇及其伴侣的克制饮食行为与更健康的妊娠期体重增加有关，这表明联合饮食干预的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Shared-eating-habits-of- Couples-impact-pregnancy-weight-gain-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Shared-eating-habits-of- Couples-impact-pregnancy-weight-gain-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8984ad1a-d9aa-4896-9da2-f005f4e5cd7a Thu, 14 Mar 2024 23:21:00 -0400 Shared eating habits of couples impact pregnancy weight gain, study suggests
绘制心脏的细胞蓝图：对心脏结构和疾病修复的新见解研究人员利用先进的 RNA 测序和成像技术揭示了心脏复杂的细胞结构，揭示了心脏细胞的复杂组织及其发育途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Mapping-the-hearts-cellular-blueprint-New-insights-into-cardiac-struct-and-disease-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240314/Mapping-the-hearts-cellular-blueprint-New-insights-into-cardiac-struct-and-disease-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0c8b322-4a62-41f7-8a75-a1749f8a5706 Thu, 14 Mar 2024 23:01:00 -0400 Mapping the heart's cellular blueprint: New insights into cardiac structure and disease repair
